file_content.text: Eventually we'll have to get out there and clear out the jungles. For now, we can keep people away.
Captain Tolto? I have the recognizance from your guard post in the jungle.
Package for you. Charge on delivery.
Hmm? Ah, the runner must have taken ill or something. I'll take it.
I have a report for you, Captain. It seems there are monsters in the jungle.
Thank you, my lord. You do us all a great honor by taking notice of our problems.
This is what I needed. I'll start moving to warn everyone off that path until we can get some full cleanup squads.
